help.info: Linear-quadratic regulator design for LTI systems
help.descr:
K = system.LQRGain() calculates the optimal gain matrix K such that the state-feedback law u = K x minimizes the LQR cost function.
Note that this function requires that penalties on states and inputs are defined in system.x.penalty and system.u.penalty (see "help SystemSignal" and "help Penalty").

output.name: K
output.descr: Optimal gain matrix of the state-feedback law u=Kx
